page.title: 11Games children play contd.
page.content: {French Cricket}is also popular.One person is in bat while the others field.The batsman - using a cricket bat or tennis racket - attempts to {prevent the fielders from hitting {his legs with the ball}(usually a tennis ball).Should the batsman miss the ball without being struck on the leg he may not turn to face the fielder (who must always bowl the ball from where it has landed){but must {twist to defend his legs.}The batsman may also be out if the ball he has struck is{caught before bouncing}or if it is{caught in one hand having {bounced only once.}The winning batsman is the one who scores{the most runs (a run is scored by hitting the ball and swinging the bat around the body before the fielder reaches the ball). Tree-climbing,stuck-in-the-mud,50-50, hide-and-seek are other popular games.
